member.name: T:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.ExplicitContentSettings
member.summary: Explicit content settings.

member.name: P:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.ExplicitContentSettings.FilterEnabled
member.summary: When true, indicates that explicit content should not be played.

member.name: P:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.ExplicitContentSettings.FilterLocked
member.summary: When true, indicates that the explicit content setting is locked and can’t be changed by the user.

member.name: T:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.Followers
member.summary: The followers.

member.name: P:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.Followers.Href
member.summary: A link to the Web API endpoint providing full details of the followers; null if not available. Please note that this will always be set to null, as the Web API does not support it at the moment.

member.name: P:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.Followers.Total
member.summary: The total number of followers.

member.name: T:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.Image
member.summary: The image.

member.name: P:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.Image.Height
member.summary: The image height in pixels. If unknown: null or not returned.

member.name: P:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.Image.Url
member.summary: The source URL of the image.

member.name: P:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.Image.Width
member.summary: The image width in pixels. If unknown: null or not returned.

member.name: T:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.JsonObject
member.summary: The base class for all Spotify JSON objects.

member.name: P:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.JsonObject.AdditionalProperties
member.summary: Dictionary of properties that do not have matching member.

member.name: T:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.PrivateUser
member.summary: The private user.

member.name: P:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.PrivateUser.Country
member.summary: The country of the user, as set in the user’s account profile. An ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code. This field is only available when the current user has granted access to the user-read-private scope.

member.name: P:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.PrivateUser.Email
member.summary: The user’s email address, as entered by the user when creating their account. Important! This email address is unverified; there is no proof that it actually belongs to the user. This field is only available when the current user has granted access to the user-read-email scope.

member.name: P:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.PrivateUser.ExplicitContent
member.summary: The user’s explicit content settings. This field is only available when the current user has granted access to the user-read-private scope.

member.name: P:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.PrivateUser.Product
member.summary: The user’s Spotify subscription level: “premium”, “free”, etc. (The subscription level “open” can be considered the same as “free”.) This field is only available when the current user has granted access to the user-read-private scope.

member.name: T:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.PublicUser
member.summary: The public user.

member.name: T:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.RegularError
member.summary: The regular error.

member.name: P:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.RegularError.Status
member.summary: The HTTP status code that is also returned in the response header.

member.name: P:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.RegularError.Message
member.summary: A short description of the cause of the error.

member.name: P:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.RegularError.Reason
member.summary: The reason code for the error. Currently available only from Player API.

member.name: T:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.RegularErrorResponse
member.summary: The regular error response.

member.name: P:FluentSpotifyApi.Core.Model.RegularErrorResponse.Error
member.summary: The regular error.
